name: Comindware
overview:
Comindware makes web-based work management software providing breakthrough flexibility for collaborative workflow automation, issue tracking, and task management.

Company’s product, Comindware Tracker, combines collaborative Task Management with Workflow Automation capabilities: a workflow engine automatically generates and assigns personalized tasks that can be handled in a professional task management application. Thanks to Comindware ElasticData technology, Comindware Tracker can be adapted for workflows of specific industries and departments. A visual drag-and-drop Workflow Builder and visual Form Builder makes the workflow process easy to configure without developers.

Comindware is designed to meet the growing needs of SMBs through global enterprises who want better results in areas ranging from IT help desk to software development, HR, finance and administration, marketing, and more.

Comindware was founded by Max Tsypliaev, the founder of Acronis, a highly-successful software company, and is led by a team of professional executives and serial entrepreneurs with roots in several industry-leading software companies, including Acronis, Parallels, Kapersky Labs, Sophos, Quest, and Embarcadero.
